verbs.description: CHICAGO -- [ARG1: A hot dog restaurant in Lincoln Park] [V: got] [ARG2: political] [ARGM-MNR: with its sign] and has commented on the Trump administration 's immigration policy of separating children from their families at the U.S./Mexico border .
